languages.text: "Первый рубеж обороны — секретность. Никто не знает координаты этого мира. Кроме маршала и, теперь, вас. Второй — автоматические системы защиты и системы коммуникации между складами. Каждый арбитр отвечает за свой сектор и следит за его безопасностью. Есть и последний рубеж".

"The first line of defence is secrecy. No one knows the coordinates of this world except the Marshal — and now you. The second is the automated defences and the communication systems between the warehouses. Each Arbitrator is responsible for their own sector and keeps it secure. There is also the last line of defence."
languages.original_text: "Первый рубеж обороны — секретность. Никто не знает координаты этого мира. Кроме маршала и, теперь, вас. Второй — автоматические системы защиты и системы коммуникации между складами. Каждый арбитр отвечает за свой сектор и следит за его безопасностью. Есть и последний рубеж".

traits.locale_text: "The first line of defense is secrecy. No one knows the coordinates of this world except the Marshal, and now you. The second is automated defenses and communication systems between warehouses. Each arbitrator is responsible for his own sector and keeps it secure. There is also the last line of defense."

Each arbitrator is responsible for his own sector and keeps it secure. There is also the last line of defense."

There is also the last line of defence."

languages.text: «La primera línea de defensa es el secretismo. Nadie conoce las coordenadas del planeta excepto el Mariscal... y usted, ahora. La segunda son las defensas automáticas y los sistemas de comunicación entre los almacenes. Cada Arbitrator es responsable de su propio sector y lo mantiene protegido. También hay una última línea de defensa».
languages.original_text: "The first line of defence is secrecy. No one knows the coordinates of this world except the Marshal — and now you. The second is the automated defences and the communication systems between the warehouses. Each Arbitrator is responsible for their own sector and keeps it secure. There is also the last line of defence."

traits.locale_text: «La primera línea de defensa es el secretismo. Nadie conoce las coordenadas del planeta excepto el Mariscal... y usted, ahora. La segunda son las defensas automáticas y los sistemas de comunicación entre los almacenes. Cada Arbitrator es responsable de su propio sector y lo mantiene protegido. También hay una última línea de defensa».

languages.text: “第一道防线是保密。除了元帅本人之外，没有任何人知道这个世界的坐标，而现在你也知道了。第二道防线是自动化防御，以及仓库之间的通信系统。每位法务官都要都负责监管自己的区域，确保一切正常。除此之外，还有最后一道防线。”
languages.original_text: "The first line of defence is secrecy. No one knows the coordinates of this world except the Marshal — and now you. The second is the automated defences and the communication systems between the warehouses. Each Arbitrator is responsible for their own sector and keeps it secure. There is also the last line of defence."

traits.locale_text: “第一道防线是保密。除了元帅本人之外，没有任何人知道这个世界的坐标，而现在你也知道了。第二道防线是自动化防御，以及仓库之间的通信系统。每位法务官都要都负责监管自己的区域，确保一切正常。除此之外，还有最后一道防线。”

languages.text: 「第一の防衛線はその機密性です。誰もこの惑星の座標を知りません。将帥と…今はあなたを除いて。第二の防衛線は、倉庫間の自動防御と連絡システムです。各アービトレイターは各々の星域に責任を持ち、それを守ります。また、最後の防衛線もあります」
languages.original_text: "The first line of defence is secrecy. No one knows the coordinates of this world except the Marshal — and now you. The second is the automated defences and the communication systems between the warehouses. Each Arbitrator is responsible for their own sector and keeps it secure. There is also the last line of defence."

traits.locale_text: 「第一の防衛線はその機密性です。誰もこの惑星の座標を知りません。将帥と…今はあなたを除いて。第二の防衛線は、倉庫間の自動防御と連絡システムです。各アービトレイターは各々の星域に責任を持ち、それを守ります。また、最後の防衛線もあります」

languages.text: « Notre première ligne de défense n'est autre que le secret qui entoure cette planète. Nul n'en connaît les coordonnées, à part le maréchal... et vous, à présent. La deuxième ligne réside dans les défenses automatisées et les systèmes de communication reliant les divers entrepôts. Chaque arbitrator doit veiller à la sécurité du secteur auquel il est affecté. Et pour finir, il existe également une troisième et dernière ligne de défense. »
languages.original_text: "The first line of defence is secrecy. No one knows the coordinates of this world except the Marshal — and now you. The second is the automated defences and the communication systems between the warehouses. Each Arbitrator is responsible for their own sector and keeps it secure. There is also the last line of defence."

traits.locale_text: « Notre première ligne de défense n'est autre que le secret qui entoure cette planète. Nul n'en connaît les coordonnées, à part le maréchal... et vous, à présent. La deuxième ligne réside dans les défenses automatisées et les systèmes de communication reliant les divers entrepôts. Chaque arbitrator doit veiller à la sécurité du secteur auquel il est affecté. Et pour finir, il existe également une troisième et dernière ligne de défense. »

languages.text: "İlk savunma hattı gizliliktir. Bu dünyanın koordinatlarını Miralay dışında kimse bilmez. Artık bir de siz biliyorsunuz. İkinci hat, otomatik savunma ile depolar arasındaki iletişim sistemleridir. Her bir Yargıcı, kendi sektöründen sorumludur ve oranın güvenliğini sağlar. Bir de son savunma hattı vardır."
languages.original_text: "The first line of defence is secrecy. No one knows the coordinates of this world except the Marshal — and now you. The second is the automated defences and the communication systems between the warehouses. Each Arbitrator is responsible for their own sector and keeps it secure. There is also the last line of defence."

traits.locale_text: "İlk savunma hattı gizliliktir. Bu dünyanın koordinatlarını Miralay dışında kimse bilmez. Artık bir de siz biliyorsunuz. İkinci hat, otomatik savunma ile depolar arasındaki iletişim sistemleridir. Her bir Yargıcı, kendi sektöründen sorumludur ve oranın güvenliğini sağlar. Bir de son savunma hattı vardır."

languages.text: "Die erste Linie der Verteidigung ist Geheimhaltung. Niemand außer dem Marschall kennt die Koordinaten dieser Welt ... und außer Euch. Die zweite Linie sind automatische Abwehranlagen und die Kommunikationssysteme zwischen den Lagerhäusern. Jeder Arbitrator ist für die Sicherung seines eigenen Sektors verantwortlich. Und dann gibt es noch die letzte Verteidigungslinie."
languages.original_text: "The first line of defence is secrecy. No one knows the coordinates of this world except the Marshal — and now you. The second is the automated defences and the communication systems between the warehouses. Each Arbitrator is responsible for their own sector and keeps it secure. There is also the last line of defence."

Die zweite Linie sind automatische Abwehranlagen und die Kommunikationssysteme zwischen den Lagerhäusern. Jeder Arbitrator ist für die Sicherung seines eigenen Sektors verantwortlich. Und dann gibt es noch die letzte Verteidigungslinie."
